description: These vegan carrot cake pancakes are tender, slightly sweet and filled with juicy raisins and crunchy walnuts. Creamy raw cashews are blended with maple syrup for a rich, vegan cream cheese topping.
name: Vegan Carrot Cake Pancakes with Cashew Cream Cheese Maple Topping
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw cashews (soaked in water 4-8 hours (overnight works great for this recipe) and drained)
2-4 tbsp. unflavored soy or almond milk
1 cup whole wheat pastry flour (could sub all purpose)
3/4 cup unflavored soy or almond milk
cooking oil for the skillet or griddle

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in food processor. Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as needed. Thin to desired consistency with milk.
